summary: Newly married Suraj and Shivangi are on honeymoon where they meet Vishwanath - who claims that Shivangi is his wife.
cast: Jackie Shroff|Nana Patekar|Manisha Koirala|Divya Dutta|Ravi Behl|Alok Nath|Ashalata Wabgaonkar|Subbiraj|Avtar Gill|Achyut Potdar|Brijesh Tiwari|Pradeep Chaudhry
title: Agni Sakshi
